update.description:
Redo of pull request #265, now using a cache.

---

I have some ideas on how to improve performance, such as:

* Throttling the broadcast of full performer state from secondaries to primary
* Be sure to send full state once the performer changes levels, because that may prompt a secondary change

I think these can go in subsequent PRs though.
update.title: [Blueprint] Descendants

content.raw: CI is ok, there's only a flaky test on homebrew
content.html: CI is ok, there's only a flaky test on homebrew

content.raw: Looks good to me. Just waiting on CI…
content.html: Looks good to me. Just waiting on CI…

content.raw: Yeah I want to be fancy! May even use `std::move` since we don't need the temp vector, maybe?
content.html: Yeah I want to be fancy! May even use std::move since we don't need the temp vector, maybe?

content.raw:
If you want to be fancy: 

`std::copy(descVector.begin(), descVector.end(), std::inserter(descendants, descendant.end()))`
content.html:
If you want to be fancy:

std::copy(descVector.begin(), descVector.end(), std::inserter(descendants, descendant.end()))

content.raw: Ok, now using graph algorithms: c998973. Much cleaner and safer!
content.html: Ok, now using graph algorithms: c998973. Much cleaner and safer!

content.raw: Is the motivation to make `descendantCache` mutable to expose `Descendants()` as a `const` function?
content.html: Is the motivation to make descendantCache mutable to expose Descendants() as a const function?

content.raw: Thanks! I knew I must have been missing something! I'll change this.
content.html: Thanks! I knew I must have been missing something! I'll change this.

content.raw: See my previous comment in case you can get rid of this entire block.
content.html: See my previous comment in case you can get rid of this entire block.

content.raw: I think you could use `BreadthFirstSort()` or `DepthFirstSort()` from `GraphAlgorithms.hh` if you pass the `_entity` as the `_from` parameter. You can pretty much save all this code.
content.html: I think you could use BreadthFirstSort() or DepthFirstSort() from GraphAlgorithms.hh if you pass the _entity as the _from parameter. You can pretty much save all this code.

content.raw: Entities are currently organized as a tree, but I don't think we're enforcing it enough. I'll look into enforcing it.
content.html: Entities are currently organized as a tree, but I don't think we're enforcing it enough. I'll look into enforcing it.

content.raw: Can `this->dataPtr->entities` have loops? If so, I think the while loop below might be infinite.
content.html: Can this->dataPtr->entities have loops? If so, I think the while loop below might be infinite.
